          <title>
            <string language="en">Lighted splint in hydrogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleuchtete Schiene im Wasserstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attelle allumée en hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Splint iluminado no hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Splint illuminato in idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναμμένος νάρθηκας στο υδρογόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tablilla encendida en hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the hydrogen giving off a squeaky pop when burned with a lighted splint.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lighted splint</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">popping sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Wasserstoff, der weg 
von einem quietschenden Knall gibt, wenn sie mit einer beleuchteten 
Schiene gebrannt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'hydrogène dégageant
un bruit grinçant une fois brûlée avec une attelle allumée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o hidrogênio que dá 
fora de um PNF squeaky quando queimada com um splint iluminado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'idrogeno che dà 
fuori di uno schiocco stridulo una volta bruciata con uno splint 
illuminato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το υδρογόνο που εκπέμπει 
squeaky έναν λαϊκό όταν καίγεται με έναν αναμμένο νάρθηκα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el hidrógeno que emite
un estallido chillón cuando está quemada con una tablilla encendida.</string>
          </description>
